title: Centennial Park
creator_credit: Susan Doring, Don Murray and Film Australia
brief_description: A look at Centennial Park in Sydney - its beauty and history, its importance to wildlife and the use people make of it. Photographer: Ross King. Narrated by Tim Eliott.
